text: Gad gaa hana gi baahi o mee ga hagi anga gi mee nia helekai a Dimaadua, ga heeu adu gi David, “Malaa, dehee dau mee ga hilihili aga: Nia ngadau e dolu e hai tau magamaga i lodo do henua, be nia malama e dolu e lellele hagammuni iei goe i o hagadaumee, be taumagi e hagadau i lodo nia laangi e dolu i lodo do henua? Goe gi hagabaubau ina ga hagadae mai gi di au dau mee dela gu hilihili, gei au ga hagadae gi Dimaadua.”
